name: part_011
file: tmp_【#兎田ぺこら6周年記念LIVE】周年3D LIVE！ぺこらRUSH！！！！！！！ぺこ！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [E2D_YFRHFG8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Usada Pekora, Shiranui Flare, Shirogane Noel, and Houshou Marine perform a cover of 'Kokoro yo Genshi ni Modore'.
scenes.song_name: Kokoro yo Genshi ni Modore ~2012 Version~

scenes.description: Pekora looks around as the other members disappear, then addresses the audience.

subtitles.original: 悲しい日々が化石に変わるよ もうすぐ
subtitles.english: Sad days will turn into fossils soon.

subtitles.original: あなたのその痛みを 眠りの森へと ひそやかに導いてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll quietly guide your pain to the forest of sleep.

subtitles.original: おやすみ すべてに 一途すぎた迷い子たち
subtitles.english: Goodnight to all you stray children who were too earnest.

subtitles.original: はがゆい 夢に 進化する日まで
subtitles.english: Until the day you evolve into an impatient dream.

subtitles.original: 生命はまぶしい 朝を待っている 最後の懺悔もかなわないなら
subtitles.english: Life is waiting for a bright morning, if even your last confession won't be granted.

subtitles.original: いつか時代の夜が明ける 世界よまぶたを閉じて
subtitles.english: One day, the dawn of a new era will come. Oh world, close your eyelids.

subtitles.original: 生命は目覚めて 時を紡ぎだす あなたの証拠をさかのぼるように
subtitles.english: Life awakens and begins to spin time, as if tracing back the evidence of your existence.

subtitles.original: そして光が胸に届く 心よ原始に戻れ
subtitles.english: And then, the light reaches your heart. Heart, return to your origins.

subtitles.original: 涙の岸で ずっとたたずんだ
subtitles.english: Standing still for a long time on the shore of tears.

subtitles.original: 気持ちを やさしく包むように 秘密の薬が 思い出の沖へと 運ぶよ
subtitles.english: As if gently wrapping your feelings, a secret medicine carries them out to the sea of memories.

subtitles.original: おやすみ 毛布に 汚れていた指も耳も
subtitles.english: Goodnight to the blanket, to your dirty fingers and ears.

subtitles.original: この腕の中で もう眠りなさい
subtitles.english: Now, sleep within these arms.

subtitles.original: 生命はまぶしい 朝を待っている 破れた聖書を抱きしめるより
subtitles.english: Life is waiting for a bright morning, rather than clinging to a torn Bible.

subtitles.original: いつか時代の夜が明ける あなたよ祈りを捨てて
subtitles.english: One day, the dawn of a new era will come. You, cast aside your prayers.

subtitles.original: 生命は目覚めて 時を紡ぎだす 自然の法則にその身をまかせ
subtitles.english: Life awakens and begins to spin time, entrusting oneself to the laws of nature.

subtitles.original: そして光が胸に届く 心よ原始に戻れ
subtitles.english: And then, the light reaches your heart. Heart, return to your origins.

subtitles.original: 生命はまぶしい 朝を待っている 最後の懺悔もかなわないなら
subtitles.english: Life is waiting for a bright morning, if even your last confession won't be granted.

subtitles.original: いつか時代の夜が明ける 世界よまぶたを閉じて
subtitles.english: One day, the dawn of a new era will come. Oh world, close your eyelids.

subtitles.original: 生命は目覚めて 時を紡ぎだす あなたの証拠をさかのぼるように
subtitles.english: Life awakens and begins to spin time, as if tracing back the evidence of your existence.

subtitles.original: そして光が胸に届く 心よ原始に戻れ
subtitles.english: And then, the light reaches your heart. Heart, return to your origins.

subtitles.original: ノエル？ フレア？
subtitles.english: Noel? Flare?

subtitles.original: マリン、みんな、どこ行っちゃったぺこなの？
subtitles.english: Marine, everyone, where did you all go-peko?

subtitles.original: まいっか、三期生ならなんとかなるよな、きっと。
subtitles.english: Oh well, since it's the 3rd Gen, it'll work out somehow, surely.

subtitles.original: ということで、ここまでたくさんのゲストのみんなと、
subtitles.english: And so, having sung many songs with many guests so far...

subtitles.original: たくさんの曲を歌ってきましたが、みんな、よ...
subtitles.english: ...did everyone enj...
